title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: People
body: People          This ongoing project was initiated with the founding of Harry S Truman NHS. Interviews are conducted with people close to Harry and Bess Truman to gain a better understanding of their life in Independence and Grandview. More...  Â       Harry S Truman NHS Remembers Margaret Truman Daniel February 17, 1924 - January 29, 2008 More...
